Kratos:

Kratos was hit in his shoulder by one of the shots, his followers =
aimed ready to cover him but Kratos didnt allowed.
While he slowly stood up=
 helped by one of his troopers he said "Are you awared, lord Perseus, that =
she's a minion?? if you did, why are helping her??? she's a menace that mus=
t be stopped" 

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alex / rm2kmidi 
  =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, November 09, 2006 11:40 PM
  =
Subject: Re: Blacknightmare


  Perseus opened fire on Kratos, three shots =
flew toward him, several others missed.

  "Stay away from her!" he shouted=
.

  Guardia backed up and took a defensive posture, firing at the other Pr=
edicons.

  Meanwhile...

  Celeron moved around to where he could see the =
action.  Realising that his strength lay in tactics and not in brute force,=
 he decided he would come around behind the Maximals, where he could help K=
ratos if he needed too.  For now though, he preferred to stay uninvolved. 
=



  On 11/9/06, Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:

    Blacknightmare/K=
ratos:

    Blacknightmare loo0ked the maximasl with fear she concnetrate a=
ll her power in a last attempt to defend herself;  she tried to create an e=
nergy ball and tried to shot it topwards the maximals, but when she was sta=
rting to create it, the energy ball faded.
    She hadnt the neough streght=
. She moved discouraged, she was lost.


    Kratos:

    Kratos started to=
 track the minion's signature and he got it, he arrived where the femme whe=
re and aimed his wapon and shot agaisn her. The Minion just moaned and fell=
 in stasis. KRatos smiled thriunphaly and ran towards the minion.
